sentences.english: It depends on which country you are planning to go.
sentences.chinese: 考哪种试是得依据外国粹校的请求的。

sentences.english: Peking Opera, a comprehensive form of stage art, is a well-known cultural symbol of China.
sentences.chinese: 京剧是我国的国粹之一，是一种舞台艺术的综合表现。

sentences.english: After the War of Resistance Against Japan broke out, the thought of quintessence of Chinese traditional music declined rapidly too.
sentences.chinese: 抗战全面爆发后，国粹主义音乐思潮也迅速走向衰落。

sentences.english: Tusk is another epitome of Chinese ornamental design. It is the typical representative of Guangdong ivory craft skills.
sentences.chinese: 仿牙雕是中国的另一国粹，为典型的广东牙雕风格。

sentences.english: They are a real treasure in Chinese and indeed world literature. In 278B.
sentences.chinese: 这些作品是中国文学乃至世界文学中真正的国粹。

sentences.english: Going to study in your business schools is one of the top choices of Chinese students.
sentences.chinese: 去贵国商学院修业成为了我国粹子们的首选之一。

sentences.english: Chinese martial arts is the most important Chinese cultural legacy and world-famous with a long history.
sentences.chinese: 中国武术历史悠久，是中华文化的国粹，闻名世界。

sentences.english: Peking opera of China is a national treasure with a history of 200 years.
sentences.chinese: 京剧是中国的国粹，迄今已有200多年的历史。

sentences.english: Please enjoy the "National Essence Movement" from Grade One.
sentences.chinese: 请欣赏一年级组带来的《国粹乐章》。

definition: lit. source is distant and the flow is long (idiom); fig. sth goes back to the dim and distant past/a lot of water has flowed under the bridge since then
folk music, esp. for traditional instruments
Minyue county in Zhangye 張掖|张掖[Zhang1 ye4], Gansu
Kunqu opera, influential musical theater originating in Kunshan, Jiangsu province in Yuan times
can be enjoyed by scholars and lay-people alike (idiom)
